  • Uses of MyGridFormat in controller

    Classes in controller that implement MyGridFormat
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DynaManager
    The DynaManager has the main role of holding the objects that represent the levels, managing their loading and selection necessary for their effective use.
    final class 
    FactoryDecoratedLevel
    This factory contains all the information, references and methods needed to create any level in this game.

  • Uses of MyGridFormat in model

    Classes in model that implement MyGridFormat
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Bomb
    Class of objects thought to be the bombs of the game.
    class 
    BombFaster
    Particular bomb with fewer pre-explosion phases.
    class 
    BombRemote
    special bomb whose explosion is determined by the player's input and not by the transitory phases.
    class 
    BombStandard
    Standard bomb model.
    class 
    InconsistentCoordinateException
    Home-made exception to manage insertion of inconsistent grid coordinates
    class 
    LevelAbstract
    Abstract class used to manage every level subtype.
    class 
    LevelConcrete
    Class that define what is a level in this game
    class 
    NpcMediator
    Mediator that encapsulates dependencies of NPC in every game level.
    class 
    VisitorCharactersMover
    This Visitor encapsulates all the methods that determine Game Character movement.
